definitions.definition: The supporting part of a structure (either physical or organizational ; the foundation ).
The earth or gravel that the railway tracks are embedded in.
Synonym of base ( “ the forces and relations of production that produce the necessities and amenities of life ” ) .

main_definition: The supporting part of a structure (either physical or organizational ; the foundation ).
secondary_definitions: The earth or gravel that the railway tracks are embedded in.
( Marxism ) Synonym of base ( “ the forces and relations of production that produce the necessities and amenities of life ” ) .
